Board.definition: a group of individuals having managerial

1 a.definition: a group of individuals having managerial, supervisory, investigatory, or advisory powers over a public or private business, trust, or other organization or institution [of Regents] [of Bar Overseers]

2 a.definition: a group of citizens elected to administer the business of or an aspect of the business of a political unit (as a town or county) [a of selectmen]

sub_terms.b: a federal, state, or local government agency see alsoin the Important Agencies section

3.definition: a securities or commodities exchange see also
